The Structure of Scientific Literatures I:  Identifying and Graphing Specialities .A Small, H. Griffith, B.C. In this paper we report a first experiment using a new computer-based technique to identify clusters of highly interactive documents in science.  We contend that these clusters represent the scientific specialties which currently exhibit high levels of activity.  This technique, we believe, opens the way to a systematic exploration of the entire specialty structure of science, including both the internal structure of specialities and their relationship to one another. .X 19	1	1313 37	1	1313 39	1	1313 40	1	1313 41	1	1313 47	3	1313 48	1	1313 86	1	1313 88	1	1313 95	1	1313 97	1	1313 100	1	1313 102	4	1313 103	1	1313 104	1	1313 106	2	1313 107	1	1313 108	1	1313 113	3	1313 126	1	1313 175	1	1313 228	1	1313 229	1	1313 233	1	1313 253	1	1313 313	1	1313 314	1	1313 359	1	1313 377	3	1313 379	1	1313 382	1	1313 386	1	1313 389	1	1313 390	1	1313 395	1	1313 449	1	1313 469	1	1313 503	2	1313 505	1	1313 513	1	1313 514	1	1313 520	1	1313 525	1	1313 526	1	1313 533	1	1313 544	1	1313 560	1	1313 570	1	1313 573	1	1313 574	1	1313 576	1	1313 586	1	1313 605	1	1313 608	1	1313 616	1	1313 618	1	1313 632	7	1313 635	1	1313 636	1	1313 640	1	1313 643	1	1313 659	1	1313 667	1	1313 748	1	1313 749	1	1313 751	1	1313 764	2	1313 765	1	1313 777	1	1313 778	1	1313 782	1	1313 804	1	1313 805	1	1313 820	1	1313 823	1	1313 893	1	1313 894	1	1313 952	1	1313 1016	1	1313 1061	1	1313 1085	1	1313 1086	1	1313 1087	1	1313 1182	1	1313 1200	1	1313 1210	1	1313 1234	4	1313 1273	3	1313 1274	11	1313 1277	2	1313 1278	2	1313 1280	2	1313 1285	4	1313 1287	1	1313 1291	1	1313 1300	3	1313 1301	2	1313 1302	2	1313 1304	3	1313 1305	1	1313 1306	1	1313 1308	1	1313 1312	2	1313 1313	16	1313 1327	1	1313 1337	1	1313 1338	2	1313 1341	1	1313 1342	1	1313 1344	2	1313 1345	1	1313 1347	1	1313 1380	1	1313 1386	2	1313 1387	1	1313 1419	1	1313 1428	1	1313 1444	4	1313 1444	4	1313
